tool_description: A tool designed to query Cloudflare guarded websites using axios or curl directly, and to query websocket and socket.io URLs via POST. It can function as a rotating proxy, offering cost savings compared to residential proxies while providing enhanced anonymity for data crawling and analysis.

api_list.name: POST
api_list.description: This API allows querying of Cloudflare guarded websites directly via axios or curl. It supports an optional header 'Px-IP' to forge the request IP (IPv4 only), and is effective for web applications that check headers like X-Forwarded-For, True-Client-IP, X-Real-IP, and CF-Connecting-IP.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL of the Cloudflare protected resource you wish to access.
